name: WarShip
description:
You pilot a small warship and attack or evade enemy ships. At the end of the level, you will encounter a Boss, destroy it and pass.
The first version of the game has 5 chapters, each chapter has 10 levels. The terrain of each chapter is different, and each level will change differently every time you enter it.
During the battle, you can collect bullets and cannonballs, which you can use at critical moments.
